Key Match Events: The U.S. had a 91-run partnership between Andries Gous and Harmeet Singh threatening South Africa's lead
Kagiso Rabada took a key wicket and conceded only two runs, effectively ending the U.S.'s chances
Post-Match Reflections: U.S. captain Aaron Jones expressed disappointment but highlighted the team's potential
The U.S. will face the West Indies next in Bridgetown
Miscellaneous Highlights: The U.S. qualified for the Super Eight phase after victories over Canada and Pakistan
The match was part of the T20 World Cup Super Eight stage with eight teams competing
